items.title: Keldon BIG BODY Johnson against Spain: second leading scorer with 15p/3r/2stl/1blk on 7/9 from the floor in 17 minutes
items.content_text: everyone was mad af that Pop was playing favorites without ever seeing the dude play a game but he showed out given the chance. insane finisher and he plays so damn hard and aggressive, how can you not love him

items.title: Some NBA photographer caught my reaction to the Giannis dunk at Game 5. Bucks in 6!
items.content_text:
[https://i.imgur.com/Kmiq9A3.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/Kmiq9A3.jpg)

As seen on the official NBA twitter! I laughed pretty hard when I saw they captured that moment perfectly: [https://twitter.com/NBA/status/1416797412790767624](https://twitter.com/NBA/status/1416797412790767624)
